item.title: About
item.description: This is a personal blog. No intent to become popular, no SEO, no bullshit. Things to Consider I am not an Infosec Influencer, nor any kind of influencer. The opinions expressed here are strictly my own. Stay strapped or get clapped If it’s stupid but it works, it isn’t stupid. No operation plan ever survives initial contact Learn more about me here.

item.title: Hacking with OSX
item.description: I usually steer clear of debates about tech, gear, or techniques used in professional contexts. However, having observed numerous discussions about the pros and cons of using Apple products for hacking and related tasks, I’ve realized that even seasoned pros can hold some misconceptions. Last year, I decided to step in and “help” two colleagues (both professionals), sharing my experience with them. The result? They’ve both switched to using MacBooks for their day-to-day work.
